text: Kim Kardashian grounded loony - tunes hubby Kanye West from attending New York Fashion Week as scolding punishment for his gonzo behavior! “ She ’ s using this time to send a message to him — ‘ Clean up your act, or it ’ s OVER! ’ ” a source told The National ENQUIRER. Kardashian insiders revealed the rapper ’ s self - destructive drug abuse, mood swings and humiliating public breakdown last November forced Kim to finally lay down the law.
